@package musicology-time
@version 0.1.0.0

module Musicology.Time
data MBS
MBS :: Int -> Int -> Ratio Int -> MBS
data TimeSignature
TS :: Int -> Int -> TimeSignature
[tsNum] :: TimeSignature -> Int
[tsDenom] :: TimeSignature -> Int
measureDuration :: TimeSignature -> Ratio Int
newtype Meter
MeterGroups :: [Int] -> Meter
defaultMeter :: TimeSignature -> Meter
timeToMBS :: [(Ratio Int, TimeSignature)] -> Ratio Int -> MBS
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Musicology.Time.MBS
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Musicology.Time.MBS
instance GHC.Show.Show Musicology.Time.TimeSignature
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Musicology.Time.TimeSignature
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Musicology.Time.TimeSignature
instance GHC.Show.Show Musicology.Time.MBS
